The NOAA home page contains links to
information on all of NOAA's areas of influence.  This includes
Society home page contains information on society meetings, journal
titles, general information, details on joining, etc.
• IAMAS - The International Association of of Meteorology and Atmospheric Sciences
• IoP - Physics Web Physics news, jobs and resources
• UGAMP UK Universities Global Atmospheric Modelling Programme
• ECMWF - European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecasting
page. Looking at the dynamics of the climate including the ocean using
TOGA-TAO buoy data access lets you pull down plots and movies of the
latest information collected by the TOGA-TAO array.  Information includes
SSTs, winds, dynamic height, heat content and depth of the 20C isotherm
atmospheric physics pre-print service. You can follow the links to
lots of other pre-print servers as well.
• The NOAA list of Oceanography resources is a list of sites with oceanographic information that the NOAA people were able to find on the Internet.
• NASA's global change master directory contains all kinds of information on earth science, environment, climate and global change.

• For more El Nino information, go to NOAA's El Nino theme page where you can "browse and interact with the most recent observational data and El Nino forecasts, as well as relevant scientific analysis and historical perspectives."

• Mathematical Atlas - Index via Mathematics Subject Classification, each topic page includes an overview and recommended reading

• The OxNET Ox.FAQ This is a really, really useful page containing lots of answers to niggling questions Oxford Uni people may have, with answers to questions about email, typesetting, hardware, general IT, carriage return differences between windows and linux, Bod Cards, thesis binding, Cambridge college twinning, giving blood, cycle routes and laws, potholes, grammar, Scottish pound notes etc. Fount of all knowledge type stuff.
• Marston Cyclepath status information - see what the flooding of the cyclepath to Marston is like
• National Rail UK trains, timetables and tickets
• Go By Coach - National coach travel
• Buses in Oxford - Oxford Bus company
• The rest of this list are various letting agents - no comments on how good they are.
• Finders Keepers Property Letting and Management
• Oxford Property Rental, Apartments and Self-catering accommodation
• Science Cartoons Plus -- The Cartoons of S. Harris
• Physics and Science Fun, Humor, Jokes, Cartoons and more ... by PhysLINK.com
• PhD a comic strip of life as a grad student.
